casebody.data:
STOUGHTON WAGON CO. v. COWAN. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. January 7, 1913.) No. 2,424. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Northern District of Alabama; Wm. I. Grubb, Judge. G. R. Harsh and Wm. C. Fitts, both of Birmingham, Ala., for appellant. Wm. K. Brown, of Birmingham, Ala., for appellee.

Before PAR-DEE and SHELBY, Circuit Judges, and MEEIv, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

A majority of the judges being of opinion that this case was correctly ruled in the court below, the decree (198 Fed. 336) appealed from is affirmed.
